title: Asian Scorecard Shows Philippine Bonds With Most Promise in 2026
description: Philippine bonds look well-placed to beat Asian peers in early 2026 as they offer attractive yields, with the debt expected to jump in value on the prospect of further interest-rate cuts, according to a Bloomberg analysis.
content: Philippine bonds look well-placed to beat Asian peers in early 2026 as they offer attractive yields, with the debt expected to jump in value on the prospect of further interest-rate cuts, according to a Bloomberg analysis.
